mutants.code:
def count_zero_binomial_coefficients(n, p):
    a = []
    nn = n
    while nn >= 0:
        a.append(nn % p)
        nn //= p
    m = 0
    for i in range(len(a)):
        b = a[-(i + 1)]
        m *= b + 1
        m += b
    return n - m
